Sentencas: This paper explores the possibility of improving the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Innovative design to improve the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A three-dimensional computational model (CFD-ACE package), with the relevant sub-models was used for the study.
Titulo: Innovative design to improve the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The performance of the SOFC was examined with a thin wall, which splits the inlet section and runs up to half the length of the flow channels.
Titulo: Innovative design to improve the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results obtained with this (thin-walled) geometry were consistently better than those obtained with plain geometry (without the thin wall).
Titulo: Innovative design to improve the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The polarization characteristics of the thin-walled geometry indicated that the maximum power density obtained was 1.18 W cm(-2) at an efficiency of around 60%.
Titulo: Innovative design to improve the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The corresponding values of maximum power density and the efficiency at which it was obtained for a plain geometry were 0.88 W cm(-2) and 50%, respectively.
Titulo: Innovative design to improve the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The enhanced performance of the thin-walled geometry was attributed to a better distribution of the reactants along the length of the SOFC.
Titulo: Innovative design to improve the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Studies were also conducted to verify the performance of the thin-walled geometry over a wide range of inlet mass flow rates.
Titulo: Innovative design to improve the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: They revealed a superior performance of the thin-walled geometry compared to the plain geometry.
Titulo: Innovative design to improve the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: At lower inlet mass flow rates, the difference between the two in performance was small, but at higher inlet mass flow rates the difference in performance was significant.
Titulo: Innovative design to improve the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell
Innovative design to improve the power density of a solid oxide fuel cell
